title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Uniswap (UNI) Surges 13.5% as Index Trades Higher
summary: NEAR Protocol (NEAR) joined Uniswap (UNI) as a top performer, gaining 11.7%.
author: CoinDesk Indices
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3138.72, up 6.0% (+178.07) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

Nineteen of assets are trading higher.

Leaders: UNI (+13.5%) and NEAR (+11.7%).

Laggards: BCH (-0.6%) and POL (+1.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading up 6.0% with 19 of 20 assets trading higher, led by significant gains in UNI (+13.5%) and NEAR (+11.7%).
